newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT - Souza Cruz started as a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Souza Cruz started as a buy.

text.p: -- Fator Securities said in a report it initiated Brazilian tobacco company Souza Cruz with a buy rating.
-- Souza Cruz is the largest tobacco company in Latin America and the largest tobacco exporter in the world, it said.
-- Said Souza Cruz's high level of international competitiveness revealed a potential stock appreciation of 40 percent from current market indicators.
-- Also said the company has a policy of paying high dividends and interest on shareholders' equity and a track record of 50 percent of profits coming from cash generation.
-- Common shares were at 8.55 reais, up 0.59 percent.
